caption.title: Simulated cumulative average water balance of Illinois crop reporting districts as calculated using the Thornthwaite equation for potential evapotranspiration.
caption.p: Water balance is calculated at the end of each month with a linear interpolation between months. The black line indicates the average monthly cumulative water balance. Grey lines indicate the average 95 th and 5 th quantiles of monthly cumulative water balance with area in which the lower quantile goes below zero marked with red polygons. The dotted vertical lines indicate that 90 th percentile fall and spring frost dates. Mean growing degree days calculated in degrees Celsius allowing maximum daily temperature of 30°C and minimum daily temperature of 10°C.
Click here for additional data file.
